docs.lead_paragraph: TRENTON, Aug. 28--The state said today that it had decided to postpone indefinitely a plan to require Medicaid reci pients to pay part of the cost of their medical services.

headline.main: State Puts Off Plan to Charge Fees for Medicaid

docs.abstract: NJ Insts and Agencies Comr Ann Klein announces postponement of plan to pay pharmacists who fill Medicaid prescriptions for cost of generic drug instead of brand-name product, which is costlier (M)
docs.snippet: TRENTON, Aug. 28--The state said today that it had decided to postpone indefinitely a plan to require Medicaid reci pients to pay part of the cost of their medical services.
